title: Started BSc CSIT Journey
description: Began my journey in IT field pursuing Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Information Technology. Focused on building strong fundamentals in programming, data structures, and algorithms.

title: Mastered Django & Python
description: Deep-dived into Python and Django framework, building multiple full-stack applications. Developed strong expertise in Django REST Framework and database design with PostgreSQL.

title: E-Commerce Platform Development
description: Built a complete e-commerce platform with integrated eSewa payment gateway. Implemented dual-role authentication system for sellers and customers, showcasing full-stack capabilities.

title: Movie Finance Management System
organization: Team Project for Film Production Company
description: Led frontend development and calculation logic for an enterprise-grade financial management platform. Managed complex budget tracking, investor ROI calculations, and procurement workflows using React, Next.js, and Node.js.

title: RAG Document Intelligence App
description: Developed AI-powered RAG application using Cohere LLM, QdrantDB, and microservices architecture. Implemented document processing, vector embeddings, and natural language Q&A system as final year project.

title: Graduating BSc CSIT
description: Expected graduation with Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Information Technology. Ready to take on professional challenges in Python, Django, and Full-Stack development.
